Homage to the TathÄgata DharmacÄrin
Homage to the TathÄgata Hita. 4,725 TathÄgatas.
At that time, the World-Honored One spoke a verse, saying:
Having already heard the names of these World-Honored Ones, if there are wise ones, do not be negligent,
Do not let this assembly all not encounter, wandering in the suffering of the evil paths.
One should abide in precepts and be patient, one should have faith in much learning and dwell in solitude,
One should fulfill one's profound patience, one should see such a venerable one.
If one commits evil karma for billions of kalpas, not knowing the fruits of evil karma,
All of them will become Buddhas, upholding the names of these Buddhas.
Here is the corrected and aligned text:
